formattedAddress: 235 E 14th St # 237, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 235 E 14th St # 237, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Long-standing chain serving a wide variety of pancakes & other American breakfast & diner fare.

originalText.text:
I had a pancake, the Blueberry option. The place is easy to reach, with a short walk from Union Square. There was enough place at 8pm.

The service was very well, the person who helped me was kind and attentive. The pancakes were nice, however I did feel they lacked a bit of fluff compared to pancakes I ate at other places. The sweet tea was good.

originalText.text: Zero stars. My family and I came for for a new years meal. The food and coffee were cold and terrible. We ordered 2 meals for a party of 3 since one of us were not hungry. When the bill came noticed an extra charge of 5.99 , when inquiring with the manager she said it‚Äôs because everyone has to order food or there will be an extra charge. We were never informed this policy prior to ordering. There was a small hand written note behind the register of this ‚Äúnew and magical‚Äù policy. Plus they were changing $10 for people to use the bathroom. Is that even legal???? The worst part of all our server was clearly intoxicated/high and could not serve properly. Best believe corporate will be hearing about this atrocious experience and will be filing a formal complaint. I don‚Äôt like to complain and always try to be understanding but this experience was just so bad I have to say something. Sadly will not be returning. Also Peep the hand written signs of these so called questionable policies

originalText.text: Stepped into IHOP for the first time with all these expectations from friends' reviews and I have to say I was absolutely blown away. IHOP was all that and more. Pure unadulterated pancakes in what I would imagine is its most authentic form (just like what you see in the movies), the meal was absolutely splendid. Pancakes went perfect with a dollop of butter and maple syrup! My only regret was I couldn't squeeze in another IHOP meal while I was there, but I'd definitely be back for more!

text.text: Stepped into IHOP for the first time with all these expectations from friends' reviews and I have to say I was absolutely blown away. IHOP was all that and more. Pancakes went perfect with a dollop of butter and maple syrup! My only regret was I couldn't squeeze in another IHOP meal while I was there, but I'd definitely be back for more!

originalText.text:
We went for breakfast as my son wanted to try the pancakes. He said they were really tasty & tasted like cake. He enjoyed them. I was pleased to see vegetarian options, as a lot of places we'd eaten at during our stay didn't.
The waiter was attentive & refilled our drinks when asked & was pleasant.
